ack.p: We would like to gratefully acknowledge funding support for this work from NIH grants R15AI105737 to JSL and P20GM103546 (S. Sprang, P.I.; JSL Pilot Project P.I.). We wish to thank Jim Reed and Dr. Scott Wetzel for their gracious help with discussions and analysis of the flow cytometry samples. The following reagent was obtained from the Joel M. Dalrympleâ€“Clarence J. Peters USAMRIID Antibody Collection through BEI Resources, NIAID, NIH: Monoclonal Anti-Rift Valley Fever Virus Gn Glycoprotein, Clone 3C10 (produced in vitro), NR-43186.
